rules_text:
Whenever a fortified land you control becomes tapped, mill a card.
Whenever a creature card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may sacrifice this artifact and a fortified land. If you do, put that card into your hand.
Fortify– Pay 1 life. [i]( Pay 1 life: Attach to target land you control. Fortify only as a sorcery.)[/i]
